title: Customer Registration and Login Success
description: Verify that a new customer can successfully register, log in, and maintain session state.

steps.description: Navigate to customer registration page
Fill out registration form with valid details
Submit registration
Confirm successful registration message
Navigate to login page
Input registered customer's username and password
Submit login form
Verify customer is logged in and session persists on page reload

title: Restaurant Registration and Login Success
description: Verify that a new restaurant can successfully register, log in, and maintain session state.

steps.description: Navigate to restaurant registration page
Fill out registration form with valid restaurant details
Submit registration
Confirm successful registration message
Navigate to login page
Input registered restaurant's username and password
Submit login form
Verify restaurant is logged in and session persists on reload

title: Delivery Driver Registration and Login Success
description: Verify that a new delivery driver can successfully register, log in, and maintain session state.

steps.description: Navigate to delivery driver registration page
Fill out registration form with valid driver details
Submit registration
Confirm successful registration message
Navigate to login page
Input registered driver's username and password
Submit login form
Verify driver is logged in and session persists on reload

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails and appropriate error message is displayed when incorrect credentials are used.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input incorrect username and/or password
Submit login form
Verify error message shown indicating invalid credentials

title: Customer Places Order Flow
description: Verify full flow of customer browsing restaurants, selecting menu items, customizing order, and placing order successfully.

steps.description: Login as customer
Navigate to restaurant browsing page
Select a restaurant from the list
View restaurant menu
Select menu items with customizations
Add items to cart
Proceed to order placement and confirm order details
Place order
Verify order confirmation and display of order status

title: Restaurant Receives and Updates Order Status
description: Verify that restaurant receives order notification, can confirm order, update preparation status and mark as ready for pickup.

steps.description: Login as restaurant
Navigate to orders dashboard
Verify new order notification received
Confirm the received order
Update order status through preparation stages
Mark order as ready for pickup
Verify updated order status is saved and visible

title: Delivery Driver Accepts and Completes Delivery
description: Verify that delivery driver receives order notifications, accepts delivery, updates status, picks up, delivers order, and marks delivery complete.

steps.description: Login as delivery driver
Navigate to orders dashboard
Verify notification for new nearby delivery order
Accept delivery request
Update availability status toggling between available and unavailable
Pickup order from restaurant
Deliver order to customer address
Mark delivery as completed
Verify delivery status updates are reflected globally

title: Real-Time Order Status Synchronization Across User Types
description: Verify that order status updates made by any actor are propagated in real-time and visible to all relevant stakeholders (customer, restaurant, delivery driver).

steps.description: Place order as a customer
Login as restaurant and receive order
Update order status to 'preparing'
Verify customer side reflects updated status immediately
Login as delivery driver
Accept delivery and update status to 'picked up'
Verify customer and restaurant views update to 'picked up' instantly
Mark order as delivered
Verify all actors see final ‘delivered’ status in real-time

title: Multi-Language Support and RTL Layout Verification
description: Verify user interface supports Portuguese, English, Spanish, and Hebrew with correct translations and layout adjustment for Hebrew RTL reading.

steps.description: Navigate to any user interface page
Switch language selector to Portuguese
Verify texts are correctly translated to Portuguese
Switch language selector to English
Verify texts are correctly translated to English
Switch language selector to Spanish
Verify texts are correctly translated to Spanish
Switch language selector to Hebrew
Verify texts are correctly translated to Hebrew and layout switches to RTL

title: Global Header and Navigation Responsiveness and Adaptation
description: Verify that the global header and navigation adaptively display correct navigational elements per user type and respond correctly on different device sizes.

steps.description: Login as Customer and view header and navigation on desktop screen size
Verify customer-specific navigation options are present and visually correct
Resize viewport to mobile size
Verify navigation adapts responsively with hamburger menu or expanded menu as appropriate
Repeat above steps for Restaurant user
Repeat above steps for Delivery Driver user

title: Notification System: Alerts, Toasts, and Notification Center
description: Verify that real-time notifications for orders and system events display as alerts, toasts, and accumulate correctly in the notification center for all user types.

steps.description: Trigger a new order event as a customer
Verify restaurant receives notification alert and toast
Trigger order status update as restaurant
Verify customer receives toast notification
Open notification center
Verify all incoming notifications are listed and timestamps correct
Acknowledge/clear notifications
Verify notifications remove appropriately from the center

title: Connectivity Management: Online/Offline Detection and Offline Mode Handling
description: Verify the application detects connectivity changes and handles offline mode gracefully without loss of critical functionality or data corruption.

steps.description: Simulate network going offline
Verify connectivity status indicator updates to offline
Verify application enters offline mode with appropriate UI indication
Attempt actions requiring network (e.g., place order)
Verify user receives message about offline status and action queuing if applicable
Simulate network reconnect
Verify connectivity status indicator updates to online and queued actions sync correctly

title: UI Component Library Consistency and Responsiveness
description: Verify reusable UI components render consistently with correct styles, animations, and responsiveness across different user interfaces and devices.

steps.description: Render core UI components such as buttons, inputs, animated containers in customer, restaurant, and delivery interfaces
Verify consistent styling, responsiveness, and animation smoothness across components
Change viewport size to test responsiveness of components
Verify layout and usability remain optimal on mobile, tablet, and desktop

title: Order History Visibility and Accuracy for All User Types
description: Verify completed and past orders are visible under order history for customers, restaurants, and delivery drivers with accurate status and details.

steps.description: Login as customer and navigate to order history page
Verify list of past orders shows accurate statuses and details
Repeat above for restaurant user order history interface
Repeat above for delivery driver order history interface

title: Validation of Input Forms and Error Messaging
description: Verify all forms (registration, login, order placement, menu management) validate inputs correctly and provide meaningful error messages for invalid or missing data.

steps.description: Attempt registration with empty or invalid inputs for customer, restaurant, and delivery driver
Verify appropriate validation error messages appear for all invalid fields
Attempt order placement with invalid quantity or missing selections
Verify order cannot be submitted and relevant validation messages appear
Attempt login with empty username/password
Verify validation errors prompt user to fill required fields

title: Session Persistence and Logout Functionality
description: Verify that after login, the session persists across page reloads and reopening the browser, and logout properly clears session data.

steps.description: Login as any user type
Reload page and verify user remains authenticated
Close and reopen browser; verify session persistence
Perform logout action
Verify user is redirected to login page and session data is cleared
Attempt to access protected routes after logout
Verify redirection to login for unauthorized access

title: Access Control: Route Protection Based on User Role
description: Verify that users cannot access pages and functionalities restricted to other user types via URL or navigation manipulation.

steps.description: Login as customer and attempt to navigate to restaurant or delivery driver dashboards via URL
Verify access is denied and user is redirected or shown error
Login as restaurant and attempt to access customer or delivery driver pages
Verify same access restrictions apply
Repeat for delivery driver user

title: Debug and Translation Management Tools Functionality
description: Verify development tools including debug header, simple test pages, and translation management scripts operate correctly and assist in development and quality assurance.

steps.description: Access debug header page
Verify debug information is displayed correctly
Run auto-translation script and verify translations update properly
Verify no errors occur and translations are applied

title: Automated Test Suite Execution and Coverage Validation
description: Run the automated Playwright test suite for authentication, internationalization, and core functionalities to verify tests execute successfully and provide full feature coverage.

steps.description: Execute full Playwright test suite
Verify all test cases pass without errors
Verify coverage reports show comprehensive coverage of authentication, internationalization, and core flows

title: Edge Case: Handling of Simultaneous Order Updates
description: Verify system handles concurrent updates to an order status by different actors without data loss or race conditions.

steps.description: Simultaneously update order status to different states from restaurant and delivery driver interfaces
Verify order status resolves consistently and no conflicting updates persist
Verify all users see consistent final status after update resolution
